title: Newsrooms reckon with how collective identities have changed
description: In 2026, American journalism institutions must proactively set strategies to protect themselves against the crossing of key red lines in media that will be extraordinarily difficult (e.g., taking multiple decades) to undo once crossed. Organizations such as the Reporters Committee for Freedom of the Press and the Committee to Protect Journalists continue to provide rapid...
